charges.charge_description: 21:846 and 841(b)(1)(A)(ii); 18:3551 et seq. CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE NARCOTICS(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Dft to imprisoned for 78 months. Dft shall surrender for service of sentence at 12:00 on 5/20/99. Upon release from imprisonment, dft shall be on supervised release for 5 years. It is ordered that the dft shall pay to the U.S. a special assessment of $100.00 which shall be due immediately.

charges.charge_disposition: Open Counts dismissed on the motion of the U.S.

charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(A)(ii); 18:2 and 3551 et seq. NARCOTICS - SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE(3)

charges.charge_disposition: AMENDED JUDGMENT, (ORIGINAL JUDGMENT PUT IN AS ORDER, SEE DOCUMENT #63) Dft to be imprisoned for 72 months. The prison term imposed shall run concurrent to the prison term imposed in 98 cr 250. Dft asks to housed at an F.C.I. in the northeast re gion. Dft shall surrender for service of sentence at the institution designated by Bureau of Prisons by 12:00 Noon 4/22/99. Upon release from imprisonment, dft shall be on supervised release for 5 years. Dft shall maintain legal employment. It is ord ered that the dft shall pay to the U.S. a special assessment of $100.00 which shall be due immediately.
